Reviews.Content: close paddington reach easily common destinations clean looking court quiet lift floors effort staff friendly reception 24x7 leave luggage reception checkout free beakfast normally included cant quality block nice similar hotels restaurants pubs available nearby value money

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a Hotell.no traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed nights hotel excellent value money typical london hotel refurbishment 24 bed comfortable didn´t hear noise neighbours apart corridor shower forever heat left hot ten minutes step shower apart bathroom ok breakfast standards opted english breakfast bacon rubbery tomatoes potatoes prefabricated inedible nice toast butter jam eggs didn´t try continental breakfast breakfast café day stay budget trip location quiet

Reviews.Title: ““Great Location and Great Room””
Reviews.Author: Holly-Jonathan
Reviews.Content: london double own bathroom clean indeed cleaned day toiletries soap own toiletries clean towels provided day front third floor heard traffic noise window nice breakfast cereal fruit juice choice scrambled egg toast jam tea coffee excellent value money particularly close paddington underground train station bus routes 10 minute walk hyde park marble arch oxford street close wish shop till drop quick bus west stay hesitation thanks host family stay enjoyable

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel for OK price”
Reviews.Author: travel_d_z Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: relatively decently priced accommodation sufficient short weekend trip london pros walking distance tube stations price basic breakfast included helpful staff cons elevator door lock malfunctioned struggled door wifi cold furniture wardrobe 70 slightly shabby beds twin beds double bed bed blankets looked wouldnt dare

Reviews.Title: “Cheap comfortable, clean room with ensuite bathroom and good breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: helpr
Reviews.Content: top floor lift positive floor quiet apart traffic sussex gardens clean modern ensuite bathroom plumbing allow temperature controlled shower sheets crisp clean white cotton duvet cover week warm duvet kicked onto floor sleep sheet staff friendly helpful breakfast comparatively offering variety free range eggs single woman traveller safe hotel value money

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for Money & Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: Toscanabella
Reviews.Content: spent 5 nights hotel short 5 minute walk paddington tube station trains heathrow 15mins plenty shops restaurants close location couldnt perfect overall definitely stay hotel breakfast fantastic choice english fry eggs bacon beans tomato hash brown etc continental yogurt jam cereal etc hotel lift staff offer carry bags stairs narrow lots luggage andor children hotel isnt choice triple complain clean bright neat heating little intense window little disappointing basic toiletries provided minor complaint liked tv plenty channels choose enjoyed free wifi reception password account heat drift sleep major complain staff reception arent particularly friendly particularly arrival didnt recieve warm welcome breakfast ladies hospitable overall budget hotel pay pretty value money unbeatable location

Reviews.Title: “quite OK”

Reviews.Content: hotel located potential destination id choose weekend read reviews lucky 4th floor tiny ok cleaner doesnt job thats ok 55 pound night paddington probably cant expect didnt change towels daily kept using mine eventually 3rd day changed expected daily change real heat heating constantly day night solve sleeping feet window heather re arranging sheets bed keeping window little overnight finally arrived soap bathroom provided reception hotel family run business spanish family
